publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3929 Duncan McNeil: No Bail for Knife Offenders—That the Parliament congratulates Sheriff John Herald of Greenock Sheriff Court for his tough stance on knife crime; recognises that he has warned all people in the area found in possession of a knife that they will not be granted bail if they appear before him, and welcomes the message that knife crime will be punished by sending offenders to prison.
